string.name: eula_text
string.translation_description: Please do not change the < and > markup

resources.string:
New in version %s:
* Star data fixes
* Planets are now rendered in the correct order (e.g. Jupiter behind Venus)


Privacy Policy
This App uses Google Analytics to help analyse how people use it. Google Analytics collects standard internet log information and visitor behaviour information in an anonymous form. Note that the data is anonymous - no personally identifiable information is collected. The anonymous information generated by Google Analytics is transmitted to Google – not the Sky Map developers. Google Analytics then compiles statistical reports for us on the percentage of users that use certain features or have certain versions of Android. This is essential for us in discovering which features people like and dislike and when we can drop support for obsolete versions of Android and thus make Sky Map better.
We respect your privacy and do not collect your personal information. If you do not wish to share this anonymous data with Google Analytics you can opt out via the settings menu. Otherwise, thank you for helping make Sky Map better. For more information on Google Analytics see https://www.google.com/analytics/

End User Licensing Agreement
By using Sky Map, you are agreeing to these terms. Please read them carefully. Sky Map Devs refers to the authors and contributors to the Sky Map codebase.

Using Sky Map
Using Sky Map does not give you ownership of any intellectual property rights over the content you access. You may not use content from Sky Map unless you obtain permission from its owners (see help/acknowledgments) or are otherwise permitted by law. These terms do not grant you the right to use any branding or logos used in Sky Map. Don’t remove, obscure, or alter any legal notices displayed in or along with Sky Map.

Privacy
Our privacy policies explain how we treat your personal data and protect your privacy when you use Sky Map. By using Sky Map, you agree that we can use such data in accordance with our privacy policies.

About Sky Map
This software may update automatically on your device once a new version or feature is available. The Sky Map Developers give you a personal, worldwide, royalty-free, non-assignable and non-exclusive license to use Sky Map in the manner permitted by these terms. You may use the Sky Map source code in accordance with the license at https://github.com/sky-map-team/stardroid/blob/master/LICENSE.md .
We are constantly changing and improving Sky Map. We may add or remove functionalities or features, and we may stop supporting it or publishing it altogether.

Warranties and Disclaimers
While the Sky Map Developers are proud of their App we make no promises about it. Note the following:
OTHER THAN AS EXPRESSLY SET OUT IN THESE TERMS OR ADDITIONAL TERMS, NEITHER SKY MAP DEVS NOR ITS SUPPLIERS OR DISTRIBUTORS MAKE ANY SPECIFIC PROMISES ABOUT THE APP. FOR EXAMPLE, WE DON’T MAKE ANY COMMITMENTS ABOUT THE CONTENT WITHIN THE APP, THE SPECIFIC FUNCTIONS OF THE APP, OR THEIR RELIABILITY, AVAILABILITY, OR ABILITY TO MEET YOUR NEEDS. WE PROVIDE THE APP “AS IS”.
SOME JURISDICTIONS PROVIDE FOR CERTAIN WARRANTIES, LIKE THE IMPLIED WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE EXCLUDE ALL WARRANTIES.

Liability for Sky Map
WHEN PERMITTED BY LAW, SKY MAP DEVS, AND THEIR SUPPLIERS AND DISTRIBUTORS, WILL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE FOR LOST PROFITS, REVENUES, OR DATA, FINANCIAL LOSSES OR INDIRECT, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES.
TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, THE TOTAL LIABILITY OF SKY MAP DEVS, AND ITS SUPPLIERS AND DISTRIBUTORS, FOR ANY CLAIMS UNDER THESE TERMS, INCLUDING FOR ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES, IS LIMITED TO THE AMOUNT YOU PAID US TO USE THE APP (i.e. nothing).
IN ALL CASES, SKY MAP DEVS WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE THAT IS NOT REASONABLY FORESEEABLE.

Business uses of Sky Map
If you are using Sky Map on behalf of a business, that business accepts these terms. It will hold harmless and indemnify Sky Map Devs from any claim, suit or action arising from or related to the use of the Services or violation of these terms, including any liability or expense arising from claims, losses, damages, suits, judgments, litigation costs and attorneys’ fees.

About these Terms
We may modify these terms or any additional terms that apply to the App to, for example, reflect changes to the law or changes to Sky Map. These terms will show in the App again when we make modifications. If you do not agree to the modified terms you should discontinue your use of the app. If there is a conflict between these terms and the additional terms, the additional terms will control for that conflict. If you do not comply with these terms, and we don’t take action right away, this doesn’t mean that we are giving up any rights that we may have (such as taking action in the future). If it turns out that a particular term is not enforceable, this will not affect any other terms.
